description: This file defines a React component for a to-do list application frontend, including state management, UI rendering, and interactions with API functions for task CRUD operations.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React component for the to-do app, handling state, effects, user interactions, and rendering the UI.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Async function to fetch tasks from the API upon component mount.

methods.name: onAddTask
methods.description: Creates a new task with optimistic UI update and handles API call.

methods.name: onToggle
methods.description: Toggles task completion status with optimistic UI update.

methods.name: startEdit
methods.description: Initiates editing mode for a specific task.

methods.name: saveEdit
methods.description: Saves task edits with optimistic UI update.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Deletes a task with optimistic UI update.
